title: Client won't open sometimes from Patcher/Launcher
body:
Hi, 

I've recently had a lot of trouble opening the league client on my computer. I will click the league icon on my desktop and the patcher and launcher opens fine. When I click on the launch button it doesn't open the client the first couple of times. I then either have to re-open the patcher and it will close it or I can open task manager and close it from there. It shows that the program is running however I don't get the window pop-up. Is there anybody else having this issue or any way I can resolve it? 

Thanks!
